description: Try our easy to follow Campbell’s Quick and Easy Creamy Chicken Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Campbell’s Quick and Easy Creamy Chicken Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 leek, white part only, halved, thinly sliced
400g chicken thigh fillets, trimmed and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a medium saucepan. Add leek and celery and cook for 2-3 minutes until leek has softened.

Add chicken, stirring for 3-4 minutes until starting to brown. Stir in flour and cook for 1 minute. Gradually add Campbell’s Real Stock. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat to a simmer, cook uncovered for 20 minutes.
Stir through cream. Ladle soup into bowls. Top with chives.
Serve with toast for an added extra.
